markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Vents](/Rules.aspx?ID=663)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 519 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Steam vents shoot from the ground, dealing moderate fire damage or more in a wide column. Acidic and poisonous gases released from beneath the surface can create wide areas of hazardous terrain that deals at least minor acid or poison damage.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Vents

</additional-info>
